snippet: The trial of Gigi Jordan, a pharmaceutical executive charged with killing her 8-year-old son in 2010, continued with testimony from the paramedic who found Ms. Jordan with the child in their room at the Peninsula Hotel in New York.
abstract: Trial of Gigi Jordan, pharmaceutical executive charged with killing her 8-year-old son in 2010, continues with testimony from paramedic who found Jordan with deceased child in room at Manhattan's Peninsula Hotel.
lead_paragraph: The trial of Gigi Jordan, a pharmaceutical executive charged with killing her 8-year-old son in 2010, continued with testimony from the paramedic who found Ms. Jordan with the child in their room at the Peninsula Hotel in New York.

headline.main: Mother Both Calm and Confused After Son’s Death, Paramedic Says
headline.print_headline: Mother Both Calm and Confused After Son’s Death, Paramedic Says
